of Public Prosecutions, said the Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) would conduct a ''comprehensive assessment'' of evidence collected by detectives about the ''phone hacking'' at the News of the World paper. The purpose of this assessment is to ascertain whether there is any material which could now form evidence in any future criminal prosecution relating to phone hacking, the CPS said in a statement.
